line.comment: * NPC Automated Carrier : Main Task
* LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled MARS code
* Get setup
* Get ship settings, create settings if not yet present
* Adjust settings for Pirate Guild 3
* Pirate Guild difficulty: 0=Very low 1=Low 2=Medium 3= Strong 4=Very strong 5=Insane
* 0 Threat limit above which autocarrier will engage enemies
* 1 Autocarrier Engage Range of enemies (in km, 0=unlimited range)
* 2 Defensive Wing Ship count
* 4 Display warning (0=no, 1=yes)
* 7 Docked ships autojump (0=no, 1=yes)
* 9 Docked ships fuel resupply (in jumps)
* 10 Docked ships emergency jump/escape (0=no, 1=yes)
* 12 Fighter wings missile fire probability (in percent)
* 14 Turret settings (0=Attack Enemies, 1=Protect Ship, 2=Missile Defense, 3=M.A.R.S. Defense, 4=M.A.R.S. Offense, 5=Smart Turrets Defense 6=Smart Turrets Offense)
* do if [THIS]-> get amount of ware {MARS Software} in cargo bay
* 16 List of races to be ignored
* 18 Autocarrier delay before wings previously being in combat are docked (in seconds)
* 19 Fighter wings attack preference (0 = no preference, 1 = fighters, 2 = capitals)
* 20 Retreat Shield Limit (in percent, ships below this limit will retreat)
* 21 Retreat Hull Limit (in percent, ships below this limit will retreat)
* 22 Offensive Wing ship count
* 25 Awareness range for defensive wings (in km)
* 26 Response range for defensive wings (in km)
* 27 Wing formation (0=Delta, 1=Line, 2=X, 3=XDelta, 4=Pyramid, 5=Dragonclaw 6=The Shield)
* 28 Bomber Wing ship count
* 31 Autocarrier engages small threats with M.A.R.S. goblins (0=no, 1=yes)
* do if [THIS]-> get amount of ware {MARS Software} in cargo bay
* 32 Autocarrier engages targets with missiles (0=no, 1=yes)
* 33 Autocarrier engages enemy stations (0=no, 1=yes)
* Adjust settings for Yaki Armada 2 (at the moment only carriers defended by ADS)
* do if [THIS]-> get amount of ware {MARS Software} in cargo bay
* do if [THIS]-> get amount of ware {MARS Software} in cargo bay
* If no ADS mechanics aboard, create 60% - 90% of max. mechanics number THIS carrier/station can host
* Start Repair task if not already running
* Get MARS setup, necessary for goblin engage management
* if [THIS]-> is of class [Ship]
* $MARS.Config = get global variable: name='GZ.MARS.CONFIG'
* $VarName.Ship.Goblins = $MARS.Config[125]
* $Goblins.active.max = $MARS.Config[25]
* do if [THIS]-> is of class [Huge Ship]
* $Goblins.active.max = $MARS.Config[26]
* $Goblins.active.max = $Goblins.active.max * 2
* Set all turrets to protect / kill enemies
* $turret.count = [THIS]-> get number of turrets
* while $turret.count > 1
* dec $turret.count
* if [THIS]-> get amount of ware {CCDS MK2} in cargo bay
* [THIS]-> launch named script: task=$turret.count scriptname='plugin.gz.mars.turret.offense' prio=0, $turret.count, null, null, null, null
* else
* skip if $mod
* [THIS]-> launch named script: task=$turret.count scriptname='!turret.protect.std' prio=0, $turret.count, null, null, null, null
* end
* = wait 100 ms
* end
* end
* Display command in Additional Ship Commands slot
* Autocarrier main loop
* If autocarrier was started by Pirate guild 3, and the mod was disabled, stop autocarrier task
* If autocarrier was started by Yaki Armada 2, and the mod was disabled, stop autocarrier task
* $engage.with.goblins = $setup[31]
* if $engage.with.goblins == 1
* if not [THIS]-> get amount of ware {CCDS MK2} in cargo bay
* $engage.with.goblins = 0
* $setup[31] = $engage.with.goblins
* end
* end
* If about to jump away from or to sector, do not check for enemies
* If pause flag is set, recall all fighters, wait for them to dock (YA2 flag for temporary pause autocarrier task), wait here until flag is lowered
* How many enemy ships are in range and how strong are they?

line.text: '%sAlert threat level: %s Engage range: %s Current threat level: %s Strongest enemy: %s'

line.comment: * write to log file $page.id append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='%sAlert threat level: %s Alert level: %s Dock delay: %s Current threat level: %s Strongest enemy: %s', $debuginfo, $alert.level, $dock.delay, $curr.threat, $strongest
* The carrier is attacked by an incoming (at the moment, only used for display purpouse)
* Threat level reached -> start clearing sector by sending out wings
* If there are less ships ready for combat than desired wing size, wait for a minute

line.text: '%sThreat above alert limit. Fighters ready for combat: %s Offensive wing size: %s'

line.comment: * Clear sector
* If carrier begins engaging foes, interrupt previous action until threat is defeated and all active fighters are docked back at the carrier
* Room for improvement: Instead of only waiting, the carrier could weigh on account of armament, shielding and other factors, if own intervention would be usefull
* Do nothing, let PG3 and YA2 decide, what to do with task 0
* First, launch a defensive wing, if enough fighters remain to build at least one offensive wing

line.text: '%sA defensive wing of %s ships will be deployed.'
'%sAutocarrier detects huge ship, a wing of %s bombers will be deployed.'
'%sAutocarrier beginns clearing the sector by deploying ofensive wings of %s fighters each.'

line.comment: * Battle in progress
* Here the carrier could be checked for its strength, and then decide if it attacks foes by himself ?? Room for improvement, diversification
* if $engage.with.goblins == 1
* skip if [THIS]-> is script 'Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.JumpMove' on stack of task=0
* gosub Goblin.attack:
* end
* Threat eliminated, lets dock if no new enemies

line.text: '%sThreat eliminated, lets dock if no new enemies, waitig time until wings are allowed to dock: %s ssec'
'%sWaiting until docking ships: %s sec dock all: %s'

line.comment: * - Not supposed to happen, but it happens :/ so we dock - check for OOS!!!??
* else if [THIS]-> call script 'anarkis.acc.lib.get.flyads' :
* do if $DEBUG
* write to log file $logID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='%sNot supposed to happen, but it happens :/', $debuginfo, null, null, null, null
* $fightinprogress = [FALSE]
* [THIS]-> set local variable: name='anarkis.acc.battle' value=null
* = [THIS]-> call script 'anarkis.acc.cmd.alert.dock' :
* Engage little threats with M.A.R.S. goblins: We have enemies in the sector, but threat is too low to trigger alert
* if $engage.with.goblins == 1
* skip if [THIS]-> is script 'Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.JumpMove' on stack of task=0
* gosub Goblin.attack:
* end
* Get number of goblins already active on THIS carrier
* Get needed number of goblins for each target type; in combat situations, only drones are valid targets
* Get needed goblin number for target
* Skip threat, if carrier has not enough goblis
* Launch drones at target (200 km max engage range)
*$return = [THIS]-> call script 'plugin.gz.mars.hk.gob.launch' : argument1=$small.threat argument2=200000 argument3=null argument4=[THIS] argument5='manual' argument6=1
* Do not attack huge ships or stations with missiles (too high missile consumption)
* Set bomber missile fire time difference to 1ms
* Get or calculate target strength, store strength as a local on target
* Get best missile for enemy ship

line.text: '%sBest missile for target found in cargo bay: %s'

line.comment: * F I R E ! Begin lauching missiles at target
* Shoot missile only if strength points have not yet reached zero, else wait a bit
* skip if $enemy-> is of class [Big Ship]

line.text: '%sMissiles in cargo bay before shot: %s after shot: %s'

line.comment: * If THIS has no turret capable of firing missiles, simply fire a missile with main turret
* Reset fire missile time difference to original value
* If the target is 'fed up' with missiles, start a timer on the target, which will reset it's strenth after a short period, if the target survives missile attack

sval.val: ACC - Task : Automated Carrier (NPC Carriers)
Task.autocarrier
%sADS setup created
%sAUTOCARRIER started on task nr %s!
%sAlert threat level: %s Engage range: %s Current threat level: %s Strongest enemy: %s
%sAlert threat level reached!
%sThreat above alert limit. Fighters ready for combat: %s Offensive wing size: %s
%sCLEARSECTOR: Threat detected, patrol interrupted!
%sA defensive wing of %s ships will be deployed.
%sAutocarrier detects huge ship, a wing of %s bombers will be deployed.
%sAutocarrier beginns clearing the sector by deploying ofensive wings of %s fighters each.
%sBattle in progress, threat level: %s
%sThreat eliminated, lets dock if no new enemies, waitig time until wings are allowed to dock: %s ssec
%sWaiting until docking ships: %s sec dock all: %s
%sGoblins available: %s, needed for enemy %s: %s
%sLaunch return: %s
%sBest missile for target found in cargo bay: %s
%sMissiles in cargo bay before shot: %s after shot: %s
%sFired missile %s (damage: %s) on %s (strength: %s)
NPC Automated Carrier : Main Task
LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled MARS code
Get setup
Get ship settings, create settings if not yet present
Adjust settings for Pirate Guild 3
Pirate Guild difficulty: 0=Very low 1=Low 2=Medium 3= Strong 4=Very strong 5=Insane
0 Threat limit above which autocarrier will engage enemies
1 Autocarrier Engage Range of enemies (in km, 0=unlimited range)
2 Defensive Wing Ship count
4 Display warning (0=no, 1=yes)
7 Docked ships autojump (0=no, 1=yes)
9 Docked ships fuel resupply (in jumps)
10 Docked ships emergency jump/escape (0=no, 1=yes)
12 Fighter wings missile fire probability (in percent)
14 Turret settings (0=Attack Enemies, 1=Protect Ship, 2=Missile Defense, 3=M.A.R.S. Defense, 4=M.A.R.S. Offense, 5=Smart Turrets Defense 6=Smart Turrets Offense)
do if [THIS]-> get amount of ware {MARS Software} in cargo bay
$setup[14] = 4
16 List of races to be ignored
18 Autocarrier delay before wings previously being in combat are docked (in seconds)
19 Fighter wings attack preference (0 = no preference, 1 = fighters, 2 = capitals)
20 Retreat Shield Limit (in percent, ships below this limit will retreat)
21 Retreat Hull Limit (in percent, ships below this limit will retreat)
22 Offensive Wing ship count
25 Awareness range for defensive wings (in km)
26 Response range for defensive wings (in km)
27 Wing formation (0=Delta, 1=Line, 2=X, 3=XDelta, 4=Pyramid, 5=Dragonclaw 6=The Shield)
28 Bomber Wing ship count
31 Autocarrier engages small threats with M.A.R.S. goblins (0=no, 1=yes)
do if [THIS]-> get amount of ware {MARS Software} in cargo bay
32 Autocarrier engages targets with missiles (0=no, 1=yes)
33 Autocarrier engages enemy stations (0=no, 1=yes)
Adjust settings for Yaki Armada 2 (at the moment only carriers defended by ADS)
do if [THIS]-> get amount of ware {MARS Software} in cargo bay
$setup[14] = 4
do if [THIS]-> get amount of ware {MARS Software} in cargo bay
$setup[31] = 1
If no ADS mechanics aboard, create 60% - 90% of max. mechanics number THIS carrier/station can host
Start Repair task if not already running
Get MARS setup, necessary for goblin engage management
if [THIS]-> is of class [Ship]
$MARS.Config = get global variable: name='GZ.MARS.CONFIG'
$VarName.Ship.Goblins = $MARS.Config[125]
$Goblins.active.max = $MARS.Config[25]
do if [THIS]-> is of class [Huge Ship]
$Goblins.active.max = $MARS.Config[26]
$Goblins.active.max = $Goblins.active.max * 2
Set all turrets to protect / kill enemies
$turret.count = [THIS]-> get number of turrets
while $turret.count > 1
dec $turret.count
if [THIS]-> get amount of ware {CCDS MK2} in cargo bay
[THIS]-> launch named script: task=$turret.count scriptname='plugin.gz.mars.turret.offense' prio=0, $turret.count, null, null, null, null
skip if $mod
[THIS]-> launch named script: task=$turret.count scriptname='!turret.protect.std' prio=0, $turret.count, null, null, null, null
= wait 100 ms
Display command in Additional Ship Commands slot
Autocarrier main loop
If autocarrier was started by Pirate guild 3, and the mod was disabled, stop autocarrier task
If autocarrier was started by Yaki Armada 2, and the mod was disabled, stop autocarrier task
$engage.with.goblins = $setup[31]
if $engage.with.goblins == 1
if not [THIS]-> get amount of ware {CCDS MK2} in cargo bay
$engage.with.goblins = 0
$setup[31] = $engage.with.goblins
If about to jump away from or to sector, do not check for enemies
If pause flag is set, recall all fighters, wait for them to dock (YA2 flag for temporary pause autocarrier task), wait here until flag is lowered
How many enemy ships are in range and how strong are they?

write to log file $page.id append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='%sAlert threat level: %s Alert level: %s Dock delay: %s Current threat level: %s Strongest enemy: %s', $debuginfo, $alert.level, $dock.delay, $curr.threat, $strongest
The carrier is attacked by an incoming (at the moment, only used for display purpouse)
Threat level reached -> start clearing sector by sending out wings
If there are less ships ready for combat than desired wing size, wait for a minute
Clear sector
If carrier begins engaging foes, interrupt previous action until threat is defeated and all active fighters are docked back at the carrier
Room for improvement: Instead of only waiting, the carrier could weigh on account of armament, shielding and other factors, if own intervention would be usefull
Do nothing, let PG3 and YA2 decide, what to do with task 0
First, launch a defensive wing, if enough fighters remain to build at least one offensive wing
Battle in progress
Here the carrier could be checked for its strength, and then decide if it attacks foes by himself ?? Room for improvement, diversification
if $engage.with.goblins == 1
skip if [THIS]-> is script 'Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.JumpMove' on stack of task=0
gosub Goblin.attack:
Threat eliminated, lets dock if no new enemies
- Not supposed to happen, but it happens :/ so we dock - check for OOS!!!??
else if [THIS]-> call script 'anarkis.acc.lib.get.flyads' :
do if $DEBUG
write to log file $logID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='%sNot supposed to happen, but it happens :/', $debuginfo, null, null, null, null
$fightinprogress = [FALSE]
[THIS]-> set local variable: name='anarkis.acc.battle' value=null
= [THIS]-> call script 'anarkis.acc.cmd.alert.dock' :
Engage little threats with M.A.R.S. goblins: We have enemies in the sector, but threat is too low to trigger alert
if $engage.with.goblins == 1
skip if [THIS]-> is script 'Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.JumpMove' on stack of task=0
gosub Goblin.attack:
Get number of goblins already active on THIS carrier
Get needed number of goblins for each target type; in combat situations, only drones are valid targets
Get needed goblin number for target
Skip threat, if carrier has not enough goblis
Launch drones at target (200 km max engage range)
$return = [THIS]-> call script 'plugin.gz.mars.hk.gob.launch' : argument1=$small.threat argument2=200000 argument3=null argument4=[THIS] argument5='manual' argument6=1
Do not attack huge ships or stations with missiles (too high missile consumption)
Set bomber missile fire time difference to 1ms
Get or calculate target strength, store strength as a local on target
Get best missile for enemy ship
F I R E ! Begin lauching missiles at target
Shoot missile only if strength points have not yet reached zero, else wait a bit
skip if $enemy-> is of class [Big Ship]
If THIS has no turret capable of firing missiles, simply fire a missile with main turret
Reset fire missile time difference to original value
If the target is 'fed up' with missiles, start a timer on the target, which will reset it's strenth after a short period, if the target survives missile attack
